answers.answer: that's high blood pressure hun becareful my mom get that but she has both diabetes and high blood pressure. It can also be related to diabetes. Any way whatever it is if u test pos for GD. eat cactus boil it and pour it in a bowl and squeeze lemon in it if u test positive for GD it will help take it away. Also exercise and drink lots of water and lower your sodium intake.That will help u to not get preeclampsia whuch high blood pressure causes also if you test pos for GD take cinnamon pills
